data.text: @WiseAsASerpent Something different has happened to him. I diagnosed TDS--trump derangement syndrome.
@WiseAsASerpent @OGNurseRatchet I’d bet $10 bucks those buttons by his left hand trigger a trap door.
@WiseAsASerpent @trollhuntress My hope is that his people will do the right thing, and show him the view from a penthouse window.
@WiseAsASerpent He's been spending too much time with #Trump https://t.co/sTJEmVEvp1
@WiseAsASerpent @palumsha8 He should be afraid, he should be very afraid
@WiseAsASerpent Tsar of Russia they've come full circle
@WiseAsASerpent I've put you guys nearer a window to get some fresh air for......... https://t.co/FQ5x2P0xgs
@WiseAsASerpent I think Putin is a sitting duck at a bowling alley!

@WiseAsASerpent Any leader who threatens utilizing nuclear weapons is likely a marked leader. The world is watching. The world expects his own oligarchy government to remove Putin.  He cannot continue as President of Russia.
